title: Celebrating the Life Carlos Fuente Sr.
itunes:title: Celebrating the Life Carlos Fuente Sr.
description:
Today, May 6th, 2017 would have been the 82nd birthday of Carlos Fuente Sr. and we celebrate the life of the cigar industry icon. In the first hour we light up a cigar that Carlos Fuente Sr. blended for his father with the 8-5-8 and we let you know the significance of those numbers.

In the second hour we raid David Garofalo’s private stash, with a box that he received from Carlos Fuente Sr. 6 years ago to celebrate his 76th birthday. The box has remained sealed until today, when we crack it open and enjoy one in his memory.

We are joined live by Fuente-Newman rep, Brad Jarvis as we will talk scotch and cigars, and discuss pairing with a professional…

Join us, the 2016 Ambassadors of Cigars according to Cigar Journal Magazine on the longest running cigar podcast in existence, The Cigar Authority live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

As always, you can find most of the cigars we talk about at www.2guyscigars.com
